artifacts.summary: Research on what to EXCLUDE from ROADMAP.md: clutter analysis (~270 line reduction), Dead Ends section design using ADR patterns, content boundaries (strategic/operational/tactical), and quarterly archival guidelines

next_steps: Run /plan 833 to create implementation plan integrating both research-001.md (additions) and research-002.md (exclusions)

key_findings: ~270 lines of clutter identified for removal/relocation (28% reduction)
Dead Ends section design with ADR-inspired schema
4 initial dead ends identified from codebase analysis
